author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Support arbitrary path names in the TriggerResultsFilter in HLTPathStatus mode

Other changes:
  - clean up and modernise the module
  - add a new unit test for the HLTPathStatus mode

#### PR validation:

The new unit tests should run.

#### Backport status

This PR is a backport to 12.2.x of #36732 .
title: Support arbitrary path names in the TriggerResultsFilter in HLTPathStatus mode [12.2.x]
